thread.title: Food by Dish host annual venue summer party aboard the M.V. Erasmus
thread.title_full: Food by Dish host annual venue summer party aboard the M.V. Erasmus

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Food by Dish host annual venue summer party aboard the M.V. Erasmus
text:
Food by Dish host annual venue summer party aboard the M.V. Erasmus Food by Dish host annual venue summer party aboard the M.V. Erasmus Details Category: Agency & Association   11:00 Leading London caterers Food by Dish hosted their summer venue party on Tuesday evening (1st September), treating guests to a voyage and dinner on the River Thames. 100 guests joined the crew aboard the Thames Luxury Charters vessel M.V. Erasmus for a Japanese themed journey. Enjoying an evening of assorted sushi, served from a sushi conveyer belt, as well as a BBQ, passengers were also able to partake in origami making classes and live entertainment courtesy of a Saxophonist and DJ. 
A Champagne and cocktail reception was held on the Erasmus before departing Butlers Wharf Pier and taking party goers on a three hour voyage along the Thames. While surrounded by the London skyline, guests were treated to a Japanese food station featuring freshly prepared Miso marinated baby back ribs; Yuzu Kosho chicken yakitori; Mirin glazed salmon; Japanese beef yakiniku and vegetable teriyaki. All were served with a choice of Sunomono, Goma-ae and mixed leaf salads. A selection of assorted sweet sushi canap√© desserts were also available and served from the sushi conveyer belt.
